summary: This bill, S. 1279, proposes to rename the Hulls Cove Visitor Center at Acadia National Park in Bar Harbor, Maine, as the George J. Mitchell Visitor Center. The bill specifies that any future successor to the visitor center will also bear the new name, and directs all existing references to the original name be updated accordingly. The bill was introduced by Mr. King (and Ms. Collins) on April 3, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
